title: Adoption Timeline
description: Time to ~50M users adoption, showing exponential compression from years to days (1957-2026).

fields.Category: Tech category (Hardware, Software, Internet/Web, Mobile, Social/Apps, Cloud, AI/Agentic)
fields.Days_to_Adoption: Days to reach ~50M users or equivalent adoption milestone
fields.Impact: Historical impact level (Transformative, High, Medium, Speculative)

transformations: Log10(days) for y-axis. Midpoints used for date ranges. Pre-1990 estimates approximate.
author: mschwar
